miscontent.title: 更新FMGC导航数据库. UPDATE FMGC NAVIGATION DATABASE.

task.title: Uploading of the FM Data
task.title-zh: 更新 FMGC 导航数据库

description.para: CKPT,FWD COMPT BHD TO FLT COMPT BULKHEAD

reftitle.para: Energize the Aircraft Electrical Circuits from the External Power
Energize the Aircraft Electrical Circuits from the APU
Energize the Aircraft Electrical Circuits from Engine 1(2)
De-energize the Aircraft Electrical Circuits Supplied from the External Power
De-energize the Aircraft Electrical Circuits Supplied from the APU
De-energize the Aircraft Electrical Circuits Supplied from the Engine 1(2)

l2item.para: On the overhead panel, on the DATA LOADING panel 52VU:

l3item.para: Loosen the two middle quick-release fasteners of the access cover and remove it.
松开盖板上两个中间的快卸螺丝，拆下盖板。
Connect the cable to PMAT2000 data loader and to the data loader connector (2TD).
用数据线连接PMAT2000数据装载机和数据装载(2TD)。

l1item.para: Make sure that this(these) circuit breaker(s) is(are) closed:
确认下列跳开关处于闭合状态：
Make sure that the aircraft is in the ground configuration.
确认飞机处在地面构型。

note.para: This procedure is for the FMGC1. For the FMGC2, which is identical, use the indications between the parentheses.

note-zh.para: 本程序适用于FMGC1和FMGC2,对于FMGC2使用括号中的指示。

note.para: The result may be different due to different software version of the PMAT2000 data loader.

note-zh.para: PMAT2000数据装载机软件包版本不同，显示结果可能不同。

note.para:
When the uploading of the FMGC is completed, you can use the XLOAD function to load the other FMGC 22-70-00-610-009
22-70-00-610-009-A
.

当一台FMGC数据库更新完成后，可以使用XLOAD功能来更新另一台FMGC。 22-70-00-610-009
22-70-00-610-009-A
.
The uploading time for one full disk is twelve minutes approximately.

note-zh.para: 一张磁盘的更新时间大约需要12分钟。

note.para: After the uploading operations, you must do a check of navigation database version and date through MCDU.

note-zh.para: 加装完成后，必须通过MCDU检查导航数据库版本和日期。

entry.para: 1.On the overhead panel, on the Data Loading Selector (DLS):
On the display of the DLS:

unlitem.para: Set the ON/OFF switch to ON.

entry.para: 2.On the overhead panel and rear CB panel:
在头顶面板和后跳开关面板上：
3.On the overhead panel, on the DLS:

unlitem.para: Push the PREV or NEXT key until you get the indication of the FMGC that you can load.
按压PREV或NEXT键，直到出现所需安装数据库的FMGC

entry.para: On the display of the DLS:
在头顶面板（后跳开关面板）上：
5.On the PMAT2000 data loader main menu:
Floppy Drive and PMAT 2000 Mass Storage columns displayed.
显示Floppy Drive和PMAT 2000 Mass Storage栏。
in PART column, select the current available navigation database P/N.
在PART栏，选择当前有效的导航数据库件号。

note.para: For the current available navigation database version number, See the RISK TIPS column.

note-zh.para: 当前有效的导航数据库版本号在风险提示栏中。

entry.para: Enter the associated RSN in Tail Number column;
在Tail Number栏输入相应的飞机注册号；
Loading page displayed, and the loading starts.
显示加载页面并开始加载。
After loading completed, LOAD COMPLETE displayed.
加载完成后，会显示LOAD COMPLETE。
11.On the overhead panel, on the DLS:
On the display of the Data Loading Selector:

unlitem.para: Set the ON/OFF switch to OFF.

entry.para: 13.Open circuit breakers 10CA1 and 10CA2 (wait for more than 15 seconds).
拔出10CA1和10CA2跳开关并等待至少 15秒钟。
15.Close the circuit breakers 10CA1(2), and wait until the FMGC safety test is completed.
闭合10CA1(2)，并等待FMGC安全测试完成。

l1item.para: Do a check of the reference of the software loaded in the FMGC, on the MCDU:
在 MCDU 上检查 FMGC的装载的数据库信息：

l2item.para: Make sure that the P/N XLOAD page is shown on the MCDU:
确认在MCDU上出现P/N XLOAD页面：

unlitem.para: Push the LSK adjacent to the FMGC indication.
The A/C STATUS page comes into view.
Push the LSK adjacent to the SOFTWARE STATUS/XLOAD indication.
The P/N STATUS page comes into view.
Get the page of the NDB.
Make sure that the date and the version number of the NDB is the same as what provided in RISK TIPS column.
确认导航数据库的日期和版本号与风险提示栏中一致。

entry.para: 4.Record the date and version number of ACTICE NAV DATA BASE:
记录当前激活导航数据库的日期和版本号：
5.Record the date of SECOND NAV DATA BASE:
记录第二导航数据库的日期：

l1item.para: Removal of the PMAT2000 data loader

l2item.para: On the overhead panel, on the DATA LOADING panel 52VU:
在头顶数据装载面板52VU上：

l3item.para: Disconnect the cable from the PMAT2000 data loader and from the data loader connector (2TD).
从PMAT2000数据装载机和52VU面板上的数据上载接口（2TD）上断开数据线。
Install the access cover and tighten the two middle quick-release fasteners.
安装盖板并锁紧两个中间快卸螺丝。

l1item.para: Put the aircraft back to its initial configuration.
将飞机恢复到正常构型。

l2item.para: On the MCDU, push the MCDU MENU key to get the MCDU MENU page.
在MCDU上，按压MCDU MENU键返回到MCDU MENU页面。
